sec.title: Two-person operation
sec.p: When there is a need for an operator or a helper to work on the rig in the working area or hazard zone as a two-man operation and this involves activation of one or several machine functions, the following design requirements apply:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: there shall be sufficient visibility from the operator station, or other means, for the operator to ensure the helper is clear of hazards created by operator actions;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: when the operation is designed to be performed as a two-person operation, the design shall prevent operation by one person;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: the operator and helper shall have immediate access to an emergency stop in all situations;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: the area where the work is to be carried out shall be properly illuminated;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: communication between the helper and the supervisor at the main operator's position shall be possible to be established in a reliable manner;

list-item.label: f)
list-item.p: if practically possible, the helper shall be provided with similar operator protection system as the operator.
